title: About Scratchy Fish
content:
Scratchy Fish is a progressive jazz rock band from San Jose, California.

Our debut album "Attack of the Banana Slugs" features original compositions and creative covers, blending jazz improvisation with rock energy.

members.name: Mike Fullerton
members.bio: It has been said that Mike was discovered in 1572 in the treacherous and the snow capped Lorne mountains of Flindrikin Scotland by a rambunctious (and comprehensively sloshed) football squad looking for an open pub (after a glorious victory on the pitch). That night, under an orange moon, Mike was heard in the distance playing traditional Highland Hochmagandy Polyrhythms with half chewed femur bones (from enormous sheep) on an elaborate arrangement of hollow and resonating shells of the (now extinct) Numpty Marsh Turtle. Legend holds that he was blootered on homemade fermented Bowfin Fruit Wine. All he would say when spoken to is "I was born in 1518 in the village of Glenfinnan on the shores of Loch Shiel and I am immortal." He likes short walks on the beach, posing with fish in photographs, and he still plays Highland Hochmagandy Polyrhythms when he thinks no one is listening.
